info.name: addControl
info.arguments: (name: string, control: AbstractControl, { updateParentValidity = true, runAsyncValidators = false, updateParentDirty = true }: ControlUpdateOptions = {})

get.desciption: Find and return nested control by path.

info.name: setControl
info.arguments: (name: string, control: AbstractControl, { updateParentValidity = true, runAsyncValidators = false, updateParentDirty = true }: ControlUpdateOptions = {})

setControl.desciption:
Searches for and replaces a control by name.
If control not exist, the method does nothing.

info.name: setValue
info.arguments: (value: { [key: string]: unknown }, { updateParentValidity = true, runAsyncValidators = true, updateParentDirty = true }: ControlUpdateOptions = {})

info.name: removeControl
info.arguments: (name: string, { updateParentValidity = true, runAsyncValidators = true, updateParentDirty = true }: ControlUpdateOptions = {})

contains.desciption: If the control exists, return true otherwise false

reset.desciption: Reset child control value and clear all errors
